params.name: username
params.desc: The username of the Keystore user

params.name: password
params.desc: The password of the Keystore user

params.name: nodeID
params.desc: The node ID of the validator

params.name: subnetID
params.desc: Either a {@link https://github.com/feross/buffer|Buffer} or a cb58 serialized string for the SubnetID or its alias.

params.name: startTime
params.desc: Javascript Date object for the start time to validate

params.name: endTime
params.desc: Javascript Date object for the end time to validate

params.name: weight
params.desc: The validator’s weight used for sampling

name: addSubnetValidator
desc: Add a validator to a Subnet other than the Primary Network. The validator must validate the Primary Network for the entire duration they validate this Subnet.
